verses.verse: (For the choir director. [A Psalm] of David.) The fool <S%H5036><s%> has said <S%H559><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> "There <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>" They are corrupt, <S%H7843><s%> they have committed <S%H8581><s%> abominable <S%H8581><s%> deeds; <S%H5949><s%> There <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> who does <S%H6213><s%> good. <S%H9185><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has looked <S%H8259><s%> down <S%H8259><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> upon the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> To see <S%H7200><s%> if there <S%H3426><s%> are any <S%H3426><s%> who understand, <S%H7919><s%> Who seek <S%H1875><s%> after God. <S%H430><s%>

They have all <S%H3605><s%> turned <S%H5493><s%> aside; <S%H5493><s%> together <S%H9191><s%> they have become <S%H444><s%> corrupt; <S%H444><s%> There <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> who does <S%H6213><s%> good, <S%H9185><s%> not even <S%H1571><s%> one. <S%H259><s%>

Do all <S%H3605><s%> the workers <S%H6466><s%> of wickedness <S%H205><s%> not know, <S%H3045><s%> Who eat <S%H398><s%> up my people <S%H5971><s%> [as] they eat <S%H398><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> [And] do not call <S%H7121><s%> upon the Lord <S%H3068><s%>?
There <S%H8033><s%> they are in great <S%H6343><s%> dread, <S%H6342><s%> For God <S%H430><s%> is with the righteous <S%H6662><s%> generation. <S%H1755><s%>
You would put <S%H954><s%> to shame <S%H954><s%> the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the afflicted, <S%H6041><s%> But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is his refuge. <S%H4268><s%>

Oh, <S%H4310><s%> <S%H5414><s%> that the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> would come out of Zion! <S%H6726><s%> When the Lord <S%H3068><s%> restores <S%H7725><s%> His captive <S%H7622><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> will rejoice, <S%H1523><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> will be glad. <S%H8055><s%>
